incidents.name: GoTo Connect - Outbound SMS Failure

incident_updates.body:
On October 23, from 14:32 UTC until 14:47 UTC, a subset of GoTo Connect customers may have experienced failures with outbound SMS. Immediately after the root cause of the issue was discovered, it was promptly fixed.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoTo Connect - Intermittent issues with VoIP calls

incident_updates.body:
We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our system to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

Our engineers have corrected the issue and we are confirming that all services are functional.

We will continue monitoring the situation and provide a final update shortly.

Our engineers have identified the issue and are now actively working towards a resolution.

We will provide another update shortly.

We are actively investigating reports that some GoTo Connect customers may be experiencing intermittent issues with VoIP calls.

Our engineers are working to identify the issue and will provide another update shortly.

incidents.name: GoTo Connect - VOIP calls failing intermittently

incident_updates.body:
From Sep 29, 14:52 UTC until Sep 29, 15:08 UTC, a subset of GoTo Connect customers may have experienced issues with establishing calls. Immediately after the root cause of the issue was discovered, it was promptly fixed.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Outbound SMS being flagged as Spam

incident_updates.body:
We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved and that all systems are 100% operational.

We will conduct an internal review of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our system to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

Our underlying third-party peer provider has been advised by their vendor that they are observing expected network behavior and we are also seeing improvements.

We will continue monitoring the situation and provide a final update shortly.

Our underlying third-party peer provider has identified the issue as being caused by an industry-wide incident affecting multiple upstream providers.

We will provide another update as soon as they become available.

Our engineers have identified the issue as being caused by one of our underlying third-party service providers, and we are actively working in conjunction with them towards a resolution.

We will provide another update as soon as they become available.

We are actively investigating reports that some GoTo Connect customers may be experiencing issues where outgoing SMS messages are being marked as spam.

Our engineers are working to identify the issue and will provide another update shortly.

incidents.name: GoTo Connect - PSTN call failures

incident_updates.body:
On 10/13/2022, from 14:54 UTC until 15:02 UTC, a subset of GoTo Connect customers may have experienced outbound & inbound call failures to PSTN destinations. Immediately after the root cause of the issue was discovered, it was promptly fixed.  

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

incidents.name: Goto Contact - Realtime and Analytics Missing

incident_updates.body:
On 05/03/2022, from 02:09 UTC until 17:17 UTC, a subset of GoTo customers might have experienced issues when accessing Contact Center real-time and analytics sections.

In the process of bringing many of our customers the best experience of our new GoTo Contact Center, we unintentionally enabled the new experience early for a subset of our customers. We apologize for the inconvenience, and we have rolled back larger accounts to the previous version for the time being. We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

For any Insight Center accounts which were not rolled back and that lost temporarily access to real-time and analytics, your admin will need to assign a Supervisor role and Agent role to take advantage of the new GoTo Contact Complete experience. Learn more on how to assign roles here https://support.goto.com/connect/help/video-how-do-i-assign-agents-and-supervisors-to-queues-in-gotoconnect-3-42

Our engineers have corrected the issue and we are confirming that all services are functional.

Our engineers believe to have identified the issue and are now actively working towards a resolution.

We will provide another update shortly.

Our engineers are working to resolve the issue and will provide another update shortly.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - GoTo App : Call failures in EMEA region

incident_updates.body:
On 03/11/2022, from approximately 10:02 AM UTC until 10:55 AM UTC, a subset of GoToConnect customers in EMEA region might have experienced call failures on the the GoTo Desktop & WebApp.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimise future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Intermittent Call interruption or degraded quality and delayed SMS messages

incident_updates.body:
On 01/26/2022, from 13:51 UTC to 13:59 UTC and from 14:07 UTC to 14:16 UTC, a subset of GoToConnect customers near Los Angeles, CA. might have experienced calls interruption or degraded quality and delayed SMS messages intermittently.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Call History Notifications Issue

incident_updates.body:
On 2021-12-09 from 02:23 to 17:47 UTC, a small percentage of GoToConnect users may have missed new call history notifications.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and notifications are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.
